Commercial & Multi-Family Real Estate Investment Banking

Senior • Mezzanine & Equity Financing

Strength & Intelligence
TPC(PGA)Golf Course Community, Naples, FL - Equity and Acquisition and Development loan $170,000,000 Capital Stack

With experience of over forty years and several billion dollars in closings, Griffin’s team is in a unique position to advise clients effectively.

Griffin is a full service Commercial and Multi-family Real Estate Investment Banking firm, headquartered in Naples, Florida. Griffin has positioned itself to successfully advise clients regarding equity, preferred equity, JV, mezzanine and senior financing, maximizing client objectives. Griffin’s capital platform is the solution for construction and or long-term financing for apartments, retail, industrial, office, hospitality (limited service, full service, resort), seniors housing, high-rise, mid-rise and low-rise condominium projects, apartment-to-condominium conversions, golf course communities, trophy properties, regional malls, power centers, net leased properties, as well as other property types. Griffin is the capital stack funding solution for joint ventures, acquisitions and exit strategies, maximizing terms for ground up, value add, and heavy lift transactions.

Griffin executes complete existing portfolio refinances, partner buyouts, recapitalizations as well as debt portfolio sales.

Our Team

During his 40 year career, Howard Taylor has developed major retail, housing and special use properties, acquired many and varied investment properties and supervised their ongoing management. Taylor has his MBA in accounting and finance from Simon School at The University of Rochester and a Masters in Banking from Brown University.

Under Mr. Taylor's direction is David Bradach, CPA & Chief Financial Officer, Jay Hinton, Chief Underwriter, Timothy Moffit, Southwest Florida Regional Director, and Terri Graham, Executive Assistant.

Along with the aforementioned individuals, Howard Taylor and the Griffin team bring a unique, sophisticated and practical approach that is fresh and timely.
